hero.sub: I focus on solving problems and improving digital experiences. Let's work together!

projects.title: Projects
projects.sub: The biggest projects I have created on my own from scratch.
projects.Movie Bowser: Developed with Next.js, allows users to explore an extensive database of movies and series, using The Movie Database API (TMDB).
projects.BudgetApp: Web application for managing personal expenses, which allows users to track income, expenses and recurring bills in an organized manner.
projects.Memoween: It is a Halloween memo test where players must find pairs of cards, score points and hear a unique sound for each character.
